languages.text: The Arch-Militant can use two-handed {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged weapons{/g} within {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee range{/g} but with a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}.

traits.locale_text: The Veteran can use two-handed ranged weapons within melee range, but with a −10 penalty to Ballistic Skill.
